text: Major factions get a total of 32 points
Minor factions get a total of 24 points
Gongsun Zan gets a total of 30 points
All Han factions now start with 2 army cap (1 in case of Liu Bei)
Adjusted Liu Yu's Northern Courage disable from being given at the start to now being based on his resource (restricted to the last two tiers of his mechanic)
Qiang, Di, Xianbei, and Xiliang characters and regions
Added Yan Rou to the Backbone
[[b]]Yufuluo[[/b]] gains a unique banditry building option.
Fixed Gongsun Zan, Yuan Yi, and Yuan Shu not getting their unique skills
All Han, bandit, and Northern Tribes playable factions should have access to missions
Fixed Chen Wen not being able to recruit the new units added by the Southern update
[[b]]Zhang Yang[[/b]] gains a unique forge building option.
